description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This game is based on Field Archery, a pass-time which allows archers to experience bow-hunting without the need to shoot live animals.  It involves shooting at a series of targets placed in a woodland setting and scoring for hitting the “wound” or “kill” zones of the target pictures.   Features include, 40 targets set in scenic locations, 3 bow types, 1-4 players and high scores.
